entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 9:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: SW 53 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
